verses.kjv: I am the rose of Sharon, and the lily of the valleys.
verses.ct: I am a wildflower of Sharon, a lily growing in the valleys.

verses.kjv: As the lily among thorns, so is my love among the daughters.
verses.ct: Like a lily surrounded by thorn bushes — that's what my love is compared to all other women.

verses.kjv: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.
verses.ct: Like a fruit tree standing among the trees of the forest — that's what my beloved is compared to all other men. I sat in his shade with such pleasure, and his fruit tasted sweet to me.

verses.kjv: He brought me to the banqueting house, and his banner over me was love.
verses.ct: He took me into the banquet hall, and his declaration over me was love.

verses.kjv: Stay me with flagons, comfort me with apples: for I am sick of love.
verses.ct: Strengthen me with raisin cakes, refresh me with apples, because I am overwhelmed with love.

verses.kjv: His left hand is under my head, and his right hand doth embrace me.
verses.ct: His left hand rests under my head, and his right arm holds me close.

verses.kjv: I charge you, O ye daughters of Jerusalem, by the roes, and by the hinds of the field, that ye stir not up, nor awake my love, till he please.
verses.ct: I want you to promise me, women of Jerusalem — by the gazelles and the wild deer — don't stir up or awaken love until the right time comes.

verses.kjv: The voice of my beloved! behold, he cometh leaping upon the mountains, skipping upon the hills.
verses.ct: Listen! My beloved's voice! There he is, coming toward me, leaping across the mountains, bounding over the hills.

verses.kjv: My beloved is like a roe or a young hart: behold, he standeth behind our wall, he looketh forth at the windows, shewing himself through the lattice.
verses.ct: My beloved is like a gazelle or a young deer. There he stands behind our wall, gazing through the windows, peering through the lattice.

verses.kjv: My beloved spake, and said unto me, Rise up, my love, my fair one, and come away.
verses.ct: My beloved spoke up and said to me, 'Get up, my darling, my beautiful one, and come with me.

verses.kjv: For, lo, the winter is past, the rain is over and gone;
verses.ct: Look, the winter has passed; the rains are finished and gone.

verses.kjv: The flowers appear on the earth; the time of the singing of birds is come, and the voice of the turtle is heard in our land;
verses.ct: Flowers are blooming across the land; the season for singing has arrived, and the call of the turtledove can be heard throughout our countryside.

verses.kjv: The fig tree putteth forth her green figs, and the vines with the tender grape give a good smell. Arise, my love, my fair one, and come away.
verses.ct: The fig tree is forming its early fruit, and the grapevines are blossoming with a wonderful fragrance. Get up, my darling, my beautiful one, and come with me.'

verses.kjv: O my dove, that art in the clefts of the rock, in the secret places of the stairs, let me see thy countenance, let me hear thy voice; for sweet is thy voice, and thy countenance is comely.
verses.ct: 'My dove, hiding in the crevices of the cliff, tucked away in the rocky heights — let me see your face, let me hear your voice, because your voice is lovely and your face is beautiful.'

verses.kjv: Take us the foxes, the little foxes, that spoil the vines: for our vines have tender grapes.
verses.ct: Catch the foxes for us — those little foxes that are ruining the vineyards — because our vines are in bloom.

verses.kjv: My beloved is mine, and I am his: he feedeth among the lilies.
verses.ct: My beloved belongs to me, and I belong to him. He wanders among the lilies.

verses.kjv: Until the day break, and the shadows flee away, turn, my beloved, and be thou like a roe or a young hart upon the mountains of Bether.
verses.ct: Before the day dawns and the shadows disappear, come back to me, my beloved — be like a gazelle or a young deer on the mountains of Bether.
